Preparer: Can retrieve the GST return after logging into myTax Portal.
Approver: Can retrieve the GST return after logging into myTax Portal.

Preparer: Can complete GST return and save it as a draft.
Approver: Can complete GST return and save it as a draft, or review the GST return completed by the Preparer.

Preparer: Cannot submit the GST return to IRAS.“Pending Approval” message will be displayed on screen.Has to inform the ‘Approver’ that the draft is ready for review before submission to IRAS.
Approver: Can submit the GST return to IRAS.
